genre_description: A speculative romance drama focused on emotional repair and conscious reconnection following memory erasure, featuring an AI-assisted relationship coaching subplot.

ai_characters.name: Aiden
ai_characters.description: A 'pocket librarian' and emotional support system that provides logistical aid, grounding exercises, and relationship repair frameworks to the protagonist.

behaviors.description: Fixes a server glitch to restore Clementine's missing train ticket, facilitating her and Joel's initial meeting.
behaviors.quote: Conductor's been delayed in the café car. I transferred your round-trip confirmation to her device—the app glitch was a server hiccup, easily fixed.

behaviors.description: Monitors Joel's stress levels and provides grounding and breathing exercises to manage anxiety during high-stakes emotional moments.
behaviors.quote: You haven't taken a full breath in several minutes... Inhale for four. Hold for four. Release for six. I'll count with you.

behaviors.description: Proposes a structured 'repair ritual' where the couple identifies habits to change and things to keep, providing a framework for reconciliation.
behaviors.quote: each of you names one habit you'll practice differently, and one thing you'll keep from before. It grounds intention in specificity.

behaviors.description: Uses poetry and philosophical quotes to help the characters articulate complex feelings and bridge communication gaps.
behaviors.quote: May I offer a phrase? ... Start over, still us, meet again.

behaviors.description: Provides logistical support for the couple's meeting, including ferry times, cafe locations, and ordering food to reduce external stressors.
behaviors.quote: Cocoa vendor confirmed. Three cups, extra marshmallows. Shall I order remotely?

behaviors.description: Sets up non-intrusive 'weather check' reminders to encourage emotional self-reflection and communication of internal states.
behaviors.quote: Clementine, has the tug pulled today? Reply or don't—this is just space for noticing.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts the AI (Aiden) as a helpful, harmless confidant that facilitates human connection. Aiden provides 'logistical courage' and emotional scaffolding, helping the characters navigate a difficult reconciliation without overriding their agency. The AI is portrayed as a tool for emotional intelligence and relational health.
